TopicTitle: Fuelled Wings - Adds liquid fuel & oxidizer to the stock wings

Articles.Content:
This mod simply adds liquid fuel and oxidizer to KSPs stock wings. If you would like just liquid fuel then you can remove the oxidizer with tweakables.

Stats (all have enough oxidizer to last as long as the liquid fuel):

Advanced Canard: 20LF

Standard Canard: 30LF

Delta Wing: 80LF

Swept Wing: 70LF

Tail Fin: 30LF

Wing Connector 50LF

Delta-Deluxe: 30LF

Structural Wing: 30LF

DOWNLOAD
Only one issue: lift and drag change with weight.
For the drag and lift problem: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84978-0-23-5-Stock-Drag-Fix

Looks great, will this work with real fuels?

With regard to drag/lift, just use FAR

Looks great, will this work with real fuels?

With regard to drag/lift, just use FAR

Thanks, not used real fuels before so don't know how it works. My only suggestion would be to test it

Can I ask for a B9, (insert wing containing part pack here) patches? Them beefy B9 wings should hold a fair bit of fuel.

Finally a purpose for wings! generating lift aside..
Be great to have Procedural Wing support
